entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:52 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
